message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product. It's worth $12,000 to you, and I believe we can come to an agreement that benefits both of us. To start, I'll offer you the product for $10,000.
Thanks for the offer, Alice. While I appreciate it, I'm looking to pay closer to $9,000. It's a fair price that reflects the value I place on the product.
Thank you for your response, Bob. I understand your position and would like to make a counteroffer. Considering the value you place on the product, I am willing to offer it for $9,500.
